text:
Dr. Harry J. Skornia -2- December 8, 1960
concept as applied to Washington news. I am hopeful that
we can work something out with him.
How goes the solitary life of the scholar? Does the change
of pace make you feel as though you have sunk into a state
of innocuous desuetude?
Things in Washington are gay and jolly; Pearl and all the
gang send their greetings.
Cordially yours#
William G. Harley
WGH :mem
